document.title: TN Department of Education, Career and Technical Education

7363DC00C9A641AEA77C21A8ADD344D3.description:
Select a historical event, scientific procedure, or technical process to narrate in a
comprehensive report and presentation, practicing effective word processing, spreadsheet,
and presentation skills. Develop and strengthen writing and data organization through
planning, revising, peer-review, editing, and rewriting throughout the course.

10ECC5401D884A11B5A45B1A93201E04.description:
Throughout the course, conduct a sustained research project to answer a question or solve a
problem. Synthesize research into an argument that is established, developed, and supported
with multiple sources of data and evidence. Demonstrate authentic technical skills in word
processing, presentations, and spreadsheet applications, effectively combining functionality
of multiple software applications to present a coherent final project, including a report (with
imported data, appendixes, etc.) and presentation with appropriate citations from text. Use
selected technology to produce, publish, and update final projects.

D84ABA723DFD47A7855295FAFE6DEB29.description:
Protect and share presentations using encryption, passwords, media compression,
and permissions, while ensuring accessibility and compatibility are maintained for a
given situation or scenario

8DBA2001657B4D6FAD9F2D3CB3DA0409.description:
Track changes and resolve differences (such as discarding changes or managing
comments) to focus on what is most significant for a specific purpose and audience

0A54B1E7242843248B5A56A1D34F3DB8.description:
Merge content from multiple presentations and reuse appropriate slides with
separate or similar formatting

2B3A448E084E490E9FA504D0371DC51B.description:
Develop, manage, and strengthen content by planning, revising, and editing presentations,
including:

CE7ECDA1637C4C2BAF9D42B9D7779295.description:
Set timings for transitions and animations to ensure appropriate duration, order, and
start/stop times for effects

5928851C14414E2E81C334A760F934B6.description:
Animate slide content including applying animations to shapes and paths and
modifying animation properties

6C7B19D7B54243C5BB24102E3AD8BD0B.description:
Insert transitions between slides, manage multiple transitions, and modify transition
effect options

ADC7B058D05F40D8AA920DEA1A1493C6.description:
Effectively employ transitions and animations to convey meaning without distracting from
slide content.

06F5B62308504B909F97DC48F4F640BF.description:
Insert and format appropriate media, including video and audio clips, by adjusting
window size, setting start/stop times, setting options, and linking to external sources

EAEF636C895547528AE0B4D71E7D61A7.description:
Insert and format SmartArt and images, including adding shapes, changing colors,
adding and moving text, resize, crop, and apply styles

72A3872D5F7649EE8545C84E1FB6E3FC.description:
Insert and format tables and charts, including modifying rows, columns, and legends,
applying styles, modifying parameters and importing from external sources

37DC66D3E059471B81F44EDE320BF1F8.description:
Insert and format text such as WordArt, columns, hyperlinks, and bulleted and
numbered lists

DF0D98B0F5D34C6C8AA671A9C59E0854.description:
Create slide content that is clear and coherent, in which the development, organization, and
style are appropriate to a given task, purpose, and audience, including:

BABA79AA989E4A1D8BE719E148B07020.description:
Order and group shapes and slides by inserting section headers, modifying slide
order, aligning and grouping shapes, and displaying gridlines

F3DD149CC5EE4F8CB2F93A7A7E2F80E5.description:
Insert and format shapes, including applying borders, resizing, and applying styles to
both custom and template shapes

2143551281D34039AFE8AB2C53AEA5C1.description:
Add slide layouts, duplicate, hide, and delete slides, and modify slide backgrounds
and styles

60FA7F6CEC964298B1C09392851CEEB1.description:
For a given content, select and employ appropriate structure to convey meaning and organize
information into categories and hierarchies appropriately, including:

E8220F1C1D0A4CDABD8CE5DC24CEA26A.description:
Configure and present slideshows in a public speaking setting, paying close attention
to slide timing, resolution, annotations, options, and appropriate views for a given
presentation venue

DE67C2A895E04F169AA15CC233C4A748.description:
Configure presentations to print for handouts or notes and save to maintain
appropriate settings by determining most applicable handout print options, package
presentations for CD, save presentations as webpages, and maintain backwards
compatibility where needed

D6296DAD075B46C1A22805294D7A8E47.description:
Customize presentation options and views to ensure accurate page setup, printing
(color/grayscale), and navigation

E6866D28D5DA4F8998BCCFB8BC6EB5D7.description:
Format a presentation to achieve a style appropriate to a given audience and industry
by applying slide masters, layouts, background images, page numbers, headers and
footers, and presentation themes

333B112194184E09A49A4015C3449CDD.description:
Create new presentations from blank slides, templates, and important files and/or file
content (such as outlines or text from word processing files)

5106A390E7544EA4A49B42088B567D4C.description:
Building on standards from Computer Applications, use presentation software to create and
manage clear and coherent multimedia presentation materials for a given audience, task,
purpose, and length of presentation. Fluently navigate software to:

C0420FAFA2664B2388BC1303AF48C79E.description:
Insert and format an object (such as a textbox, SmartArt or image) and format its
border, positioning, properties, styles and effects and colors

F011FE1A6E5543AB93F331CC8EB9F400.description:
Format charts and graphs by modifying legends, sizes, parameters, layouts and styles
and positioning

6C98D52183A14D6AAFBCDBB41D18A0C3.description:
Create charts and graphs that summarize appropriate data series, including
differentiating between rows and columns in source data

DD9ADBA2D4C748FCA36B25A9A0C72614.description:
Analyze needed structure and objects (such as charts and graphs) to convey particular
meaning or draw conclusions from a dataset.

37B68785FE0A4AAFBF4E17ED5EB716C2.description: Format and modify text with functions

275224E41D294CD0BED41CA78DA1C621.description:
Utilize conditional logic in functions (if-then statements) to accurately discriminate
data for analysis

3120F6BDEE6541C8B125AF0BB3872ACA.description:
Summarize data with functions such as sum, average, minimum, maximum, and
count

599E63B742AE4724A5BC050BE9D94296.description:
Utilize cell range and references (relative, mixed, absolute) to complete functions
accurately based on specific question sought to address, including accurate
understanding of order of operations

1CF684B6DD2E400A87A7FC4965EA4C45.description:
Accurately determine appropriate calculations (formulas and functions) for analysis to draw
conclusions about sets of data, including:

40A15F1B20E4490DB4C0B9783E3D3F75.description:
Filter and sort information effectively, including filtering records, sorting data on
multiple columns, changing sort order to highlight specific information, and removing
duplicates to enhance analysis

3C8B5A71CB6143BF8D32DE9CBA6E0DF4.description:
Modify styles and format of a table to convey meaning, including applying styles,
banding rows and columns, and inserting totals or averages

3D93DF4299524FFB92755050A872C2B7.description:
Effectively navigate between tables and ranges, adding or removing cells and defining
titles

87CA3C047EB541E897B5F64D4A2B8EE0.description:
Translate quantitative or technical information between text, visuals, data, and equations by
accurately creating and using tables.

C9AD972BC1D144CBB9E3E7DD170AAB46.description:
Order and group cells and ranges by applying conditional formatting, inserting
sparklines, transposing columns and rows, creating named ranges, inserting
subtotals, and collapsing groups of data

CF189F9EC3784E20938A9053D823A75B.description:
Format cells and ranges for a given purpose, including merging cells, modifying
alignment, font, wrap-text, and indentation and employing WordArt and number
formatting when appropriate

35B28666322D4874BC952873613768A5.description:
Insert, review, and append data in cells and ranges using find and replace, copy and
paste, AutoFill, expanding data across cells, and inserting and deleting cells

6CC54181F59341DCBC9D48AA58C9BD3A.description:
Given a specific document purpose, accurately create cells and ranges to effectively manage
data, draw conclusions from analysis, and structure for ease of readability.

8BA58F9091294ACF836FBDD47A494FFF.description:
Configure worksheets and workbooks for effective printing and saving, including
setting print area, changing file formats, setting print scaling, and maintaining
backwards compatibility if needed

44A2166C4FA9401EA96C54E7637BCE2F.description:
Customize options and views for workbooks, including hiding columns, rows, and
worksheets, editing toolbars, ribbons, and macros, freezing panes and utilizing short
cut keys

F8876FE818344E59995D1C98EEFE1AEF.description:
Format worksheets and workbooks using colors, page setup options, columns and
rows, themes, watermarks, headers and footers, and setting data validation

1DBD47F930EC4EFC9AEC9B76BE87DCAC.description:
Navigate through existing workbooks by searching for specific data, inserting
hyperlinks, changing worksheet order and using “Go To”

37D58FD3379C4A13A855D2D0C56615AE.description:
Create new workbooks from blank worksheets, templates, imported and non-native
files

A9530F09AF384BF69ADA00C22238B12D.description:
Building on standards from Computer Applications , use a spreadsheet application to create
and manage worksheets and workbooks for business functions such as invoices, financial
statements, data review and summarization, and statistical analysis.

911809F389234C469145DBCDD77E31B4.description:
Insert and format image files, including modifying with effects and updating
properties to ensure effective integration with text and other objects

E5B4EF565E58403FAF38CACA0B8E8928.description:
Insert and format simple shapes and SmartArt, formatting their properties (color, size,
shape) and text wrapping to seamlessly integrate into document

573E301D73BA43A2869F58C6A04A77B2.description: Insert quick parts, textboxes, and customizable building blocks

F5839EF2FF42479FB1D113C6CD4DA5DD.description:
Integrate multiple sources of information presented in diverse formats and media in order to
address a question or solve a problem.

77B02D2401134785B460927E5C28DA71.description: Add and modify the font, format, location, and position of captions

BCCC602B0D774A2F876A867796960560.description:
Insert, manage the locations, and auto-update endnotes, footnotes, citations, and
bibliographies following a standard format

EA67315EEA6944698F6F54B6DB0A9FA0.description:
Integrate information into the text selectively to maintain the flow of ideas, avoid
plagiarism, and over-reliance on any one source

A0B3EF466B69409C827ED226BF347382.description:
Gather relevant information from multiple authoritative print and digital sources, assessing
the strengths and limitations of each source, and integrate the source accurately into the
document using citations, references, and footnotes. Select appropriate notation formatting
for a given style, such as Modern Language Association (MLA), American Psychological
Association (APA), or the Chicago Manual of Style.

B2312E9370F647E28CF17AFA8501FADF.description:
Create and modify lists by employing bullets, numbering, and outlines and editing
indention, spacing, and levels

9F7E5F6FDBAA4A14B9CACD58B4E18D34.description:
Review and modify existing tables using styles, fonts, sorting and formula capabilities,
and cell margin and table dimension configurations

C5C7A8A83B23475DA52EF3288596DA8F.description:
Create a table by converting text, importing data from another application, defining
table dimensions and labeling appropriately

97B12CE4CC1A426AA794044CACF52D74.description:
Choose, employ, and manipulate text structure tools such as tables and lists to convey
specific information accurately, demonstrating understanding of categories or hierarchies in
the information, by completing the following skills fluently:

2AB4F4CFAB4C4E98A1138CF5FB04BB14.description:
Discriminate between appropriate and inappropriate ordering and grouping of text,
objects, and sections, creating a professional document by preventing paragraph
“widows” and “orphans,” inserting breaks in pages and sections, utilizing columns
where appropriate, and modifying object formatting for smooth flow of text

76E5B05E5C644AEBA635A4AD08A5C543.description: Effectively determine and update paragraph, line, and character spacing

90C0BC4ECDC44E378F9C0E89C8AFA9BA.description:
Edit documents by changing font attributes, using format painter tools, highlighting
where needed, and using WordArt

CAC7310AAC8F4AB29D9568CD18C07368.description:
Revise documents using find and replace, copy and paste, AutoCorrect, and inserting
special characters where needed

3B0BC44D23C14354AE7B20C374FC192F.description:
Effectively review, revise, and format text, paragraphs, and sections for a specific type of word
processing file (such as a company report, memo, or invoice) by completing the following
skills fluently:

8F8AF409B971486695309A8F00A7D56E.description:
Configure documents to scale, print, and save effectively, including maintaining
backwards compatibility with previous software versions and password protecting if
necessary

A29711E713E247C19797E1A4C7A34A35.description:
Customize viewing options to effectively navigate a project using application tools such as
zoom, toolbars, ribbons, macros, and shortcut keys

A2969482D45A42EB9428384AB6EEE661.description:
Modify page setup, select and employ appropriate document themes and style set(s)
for a given project and insert headers, footers, page numbers, and watermarks

2482C661377B42B7B0DEC3EE01025ACA.description:
Search for text within a document, insert hyperlinks, create bookmarks and use “Go
To” functionality efficiently

E9034634C1B74B769462FF95D83F7B78.description:
Create a document from a blank document, template, imported file, or non-native
document imported into word processing software

77214B2EDFFC4437B69CBFD028440ED2.description:
Building on standards from Computer Applications , create and manage professional
documents of business activities to communicate with internal and external stakeholders.
Fluently navigate word processing software to complete the following:

9D9D9F32C5F04FFF85B68DB7D67DECFE.description:
Correctly and safely import and export digital files (such as text, audio, video, and picture files
in a variety of formats) from local and networked devices, choosing and employing the
correct cables, removable storage media, and/or hardwired or wireless network connections.
Perform basic troubleshooting as needed for enhancing productivity and optimizing
performance of devices such as cameras, scanners, printers, and tablets. Perform basic
operations to change file types for effective use in typical software applications. For example,
connect an iPad via a wireless network, download photos from the device, and change the
format of the photos from .jpg to .png format for use in a presentation application.

2C4DD6AD2C8B4FFDA0D0F88B51E09F29.description:
Correctly and safely execute basic file management operations on a typical personal
computer and shared storage media, including the opening, creating, copying, moving,
deleting, and renaming of files and folders, as well as searching for a specified file or folder
on local hard drives, removable storage, or networked storage media. Build upon this
knowledge to effectively use cloud storage and/or online digital collaboration platforms and
file sharing applications. Appraise file storage needs for a given project, recommend and
effectively employ the appropriate file storage and sharing solution given project
characteristics.
